text: The untitled Sparks documentary is an upcoming British-American documentary film directed by Edgar Wright. The film revolves around Ron and Russell Mael, the creators of the pop and rock band Sparks. == Cast == * Ron Mael as Himself * Russell Mael as Himself ==Production== In June 2018, it was announced Edgar Wright would direct an untitled documentary film revolving around the band Sparks, with Media Rights Capital and Complete Fiction producing the film, and Nira Park serving as a producer. Production began in May 2018, beginning with covering the band's concert the O2 Forum Kentish Town. In April 2020, it was announced the film was "nearly finished". ==References== == External links == * Category:American documentary films Category:American films Category:British films Category:Concert films Category:English-language films Category:Films directed by Edgar Wright Category:Upcoming films
title: Untitled Sparks documentary
